summary.hook: Gun-sword legend who can secretly reach SSS rank.
summary.gameplay: Transforms at 50% HP, unleashing five insane skills that shred timelines.
summary.why_it_matters: Acts as the aspirational DPS for auction economy loops and hidden evolutions.

skills.name: Meteoric Slide
skills.rationale: Keeps melee pressure high despite canvas grid limitations.

skills.name: Blade Sonata
skills.rationale: Defines his hybrid gun-sword identity so players feel the weapon fusion.

skills.name: Singularity Burst
skills.rationale: Provides the late-game nuke designers expect from a secret evolution.

skills.name: Kush Counterseal
skills.rationale: Rewards skillful defense to trigger his evolution faster.

skills.name: Nebula Metamorph
skills.rationale: Transformation at 50% HP sells the anime surge moment without new sprites.

acquisition.spawn_logic: Low odds caravan event; guarantee after clearing Voidgreen stealth challenge.

visuals.aura: Violet energy ribs that flare into translucent afterimages at 50% HP.
visuals.animation_notes: Blend modes should shift to additive when transformation triggers.
